channel.title: Can someone explain what this error means! Repp+ Thanks
channel.description: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: XPP3 pull parser library not pres ent. Specify another driver. For example: new XStream(new DomDriver()) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.loadLibrary(XppDriver.java: 27) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.createReader(XppDriver.java :14) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.xml.XppDriver.createReader(XppDriver.java :19) at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497) at server.util.XStreamLibrary.load(XStreamLibrary.java:39) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:38) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:152) [/code] Thanks!
